title: Provisions mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: Provisions mentioned in Regulation No.7.7.2 shall be applicable with following changes :- Development of Housing for EWS / LIG - proposed in Agriculture Zone as per Regulation No.7.7.2 - FSI permissible shall be 1.0.
